about_the_game:
In “Duel Paean”, players will experience the most exhilarating third-person 3D platform multiplayer free-for-all combat! Get ready to engage in intense and exciting battles with players from around the world!

Combat Gameplay

Use a series of attacks and combos, judge the battlefield situation flexibly, and knock your opponents out of the arena through brilliant mind games! The meticulously designed combat system has a low entry threshold but a high skill ceiling. It allows you to easily master basic combat techniques while also improving your skills and mastering more advanced combat strategies through repeated practice, engaging in thrilling and rich battles with other players!

Game Modes

The game offers various modes, including team battles, individual competitions, and duels, ensuring that every battle is full of fun and challenges!

Diverse Characters

Each character in the game has uniquely designed skills and combat styles. By playing and practicing, master the various combat techniques of the characters and become a master!

More Content

  • Players can unlock new characters, skins, and items by completing tasks and winning matches, enhancing their recognition!
  • The achievement and medal system showcases your high level of skill to other players! []Rich map designs and diverse battle scenes make every match feel fresh.
  • Team up with friends, devise tactics, and use the environment and items to compete for the glory of victory!

Join “Duel Paean” now, showcase your combat skills, and become the champion of the competition!

name: Duel Paean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-9600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Experience the most exhilarating third-person, free-form combat! Players can use uniquely designed characters and a combat system that is easy to learn but hard to master. This allows you to effortlessly grasp combat techniques while engaging in exciting and diverse battles with other players!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
